transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji Dharmendra ji, aapko aawaz aa rahi hai meri sir?
Customer: Haan, aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan Dharmendra ji, bataiye sir Taruna baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Ji bataiye sir kya tension aa raha tha aapko?
Customer: Mujhe na actual mein ek manual screen printing purchase karni hai, machine hai ek.
Executive: Achha manual screen printing purchase karna hai?
Customer: Haan machine hai, to wo mujhe purchase karna hai to uske liye na ek inquiry dalni hai. Main apne app se dal raha tha to ho nahi pa rahi hai.
Executive: App se nahi ho raha hai sir waha pe?
Customer: App ka mujhe usko option hi nahi samajh aa raha kaise kiya usme kaafi matlab wires aa rahe hain lekin samajh mein nahi aa raha. Aap dal do ek baar.
Executive: Sir aap agar aise nahi aa raha, ek minute rukiye aap search option pe jaaiye upar.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: A kya hai uska naam aapka jo machine aapko jiske inquiry chahiye?
Customer: Manual screen printing machine.
Executive: Ek minute.
Customer: Manual screen printing. Haan screen printing, haan screen printing machine.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Printing machine dal diya?
Executive: Haan. Nahi maine dala nahi hai, main aapko bata raha hu.
Executive: Haan aap waha pe daliye na aap manual screen printing machine daliye. Search mein upar daliye aur waha pe jitne sare aapko bahut sare wo dikhai de rahe honge sir contact supplier ke wo sare number wagera contact supplier karne ka. Aap inme se kisi bhi contact haan inko kisi bhi koi contact pe click karo ya message bhej do ya call kar lo direct yaha se aapka aaram se solve ho jayega.
Customer: Achha achha achha.
Executive: Haan aur else agar uske niche kahin pe beech mein jaise scroll karo waha pe aa raha hoga na ki tell us what you need and we will help you forget quotes karke ki I want quotes for manual screen printing chahiye mobile number apna mobile number dal do submit requirement kar do waha se submit requirement ho jayegi jin jo bhi is category mein deal karte honge manual screen printing ki unki call aa jayegi aapke pass.
Customer: Aise karna hai aise kar lo otherwise aapko ye number dikh rahe hain sabke aapke dikh rahe hain manual screen printing mein bahut sare aapke supplier ke number khul gaye honge.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sabke naam dikh rahe honge jaise Agarwal Treffin ho gaya aapka Panchami ho gaya SK wale inka contact supplier ka contact number pe click karoge contact supplier aa jayega aur ya matlab directly unko message bhejane ka bhi option hoga waha pe send inquiry send code karke hoga na.
Customer: Aa raha hai aa raha hai.
Executive: Aise bhi kar sakte ho haan to aise bhi kar sakte ho.
Customer: Kisi ka bhi number aap directly contact supplier karoge to unka virtual number aa jayega matlab direct number nahi dikhega virtual number dikhega jab aap usse call karoge to aapse baat kar lenge wo direct aapka number le lenge ya aap unka number le lena.
Customer: Hmm samajh gaya samajh gaya samajh gaya.
Executive: Aise bhi kar sakte hain.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thik hai ho gaya ho gaya. Aur koi aur ho gaya aur koi sir aapka services wagera mein koi dikkat to nahi aa rahi services wagera thik chal rahi hai filhal abhi?
Customer: Services to abhi thik chal rahi hai thoda sa mam ab yahi dekh raha hu thoda customization ke kaam ke liye badha raha hu to isko thoda screen print haan. Hmm hmm hmm aapka customization kaafi sari cheeze thik karwai thi maine aapke.
Executive: Haan haan aaya tha unka sir ka call aaya tha. Hai na bahut sari cheeze usme ye to jo printing scanning machine ke liye aap search kar rahe ho to isme kya kuch dhundh rahe ho iske alawa bhi kuch search matlab business ke liye kuch badha rahe ho product wagera kuch add kar rahe ho kya?
Customer: Nahi product already add on hai pehle kya tha ki pehle ek machine thi wo damage ho gayi hai ab wo jisse purchase ki thi na wo banda matlab ab yaha hai nahi hai.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: To ab kisi aur se purchase karni padegi to wahi cheez hai to isliye requirement thi haan printing ka kaam to already hai apna printing ka screen printing ka customization ka.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan aapka to bahut sara hai even matlab agar aapko dekho to maine aapka product line wagera bhi kaafi sari dekhi thi. Wo kaafi sari usme aapne matlab kara hai to aur kuch sir calls wagera thoda aapka ab to aapko inquiry wagera bhi aapko kaafi achi aa rahi hai thoda sa uses wagera ache se aur karte rahiye aur iske description wagera mein kuch kuch cheeze aur product agar aur ho sakte hain to add karwaiye matlab similar product jaise ab aapka jo aap jisme deal karte ho jo aapka product line hai jaise aapka glass jars wagera ka hai na glass jar wagera ab glass jar mein aur bhi jaise product hote hain thode se similar ki kis tarah ka glass jar ho sakta hai kitne mm ke glass jar ho sakte hain usme bhi depend karta hai ki kaun se glass jar se. Achha us din us din us din ek call aayi thi senior ki to wo bol rahe the kuch promotion ko lekar ke sir aapka 261 product pe hi promotion live hai baki ka product pe promotion nahi lagaya aisa kuch bol rahe the wo.
Customer: Sir usme wo aapka na jaise sara wo hota hai jaise matlab promotions to sare hi hote hain promotion aisa kuch nahi hota ki laga and all lagne ka matlab hota hai ki jaise man lo aap kuch apne hot products hote hain aapke ki kisi kuch product mein aap jyada buylead wagera consume kar rahe ho to unko aapne visibility apna achha bana rakha hai unka upar dikh rahe ho un category mein thoda sa right aur lekin aapke ab aapka jo product line hai sir wo itna jyada hai agar aap dekhoge apna product line na sir to aapko matlab bahut sare customer aapke na matlab aapse upar aapke agar main aapka ek bhi keyword kholu jaise glass jar ka agar main aapka keyword kholu to aapke competitor bahut jyada hai aap dekh rahe ho?
Customer: Haan ye baat ye baat hai na. Na bahut sare competitor hai matlab aap Ajanta bottle private limited wale dekh lo Indian Harne wale dekh lo aapko Cosmo Pharma glass planet to hum bas ye hai ki aapka aapka already main usme dealing kar rahi hu agar main dekh rahi hu to matlab aap ye samjho ki aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahiye. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Ji sir haan boliye boliye sorry sir haan boliye. Koi baat nahi sir to ye competitor jo hai na sir aapke baithe hue ye competitor kya kar rahe hain na aapka business kahin na kahin sir kha rahe hain mano chahe mat mano. Ha ye baat to hoti hai. Ab aapka visibility pe hum koshish karte hain ki aapka visibility mein na thoda sa enhance kara do to aapko us time pe isliye humne suggest bhi kiya tha ki sir aap ek kaam karo na apna khud ka ek website wagera bana ke usko promote karo. Hmm. Matlab IndiaMART ke through matlab aapka website services aapka ye sara paisa jo aapne isme lagaya hai jo aapka remaining pura paisa bacha hai wo usme adjust ho jayega aur aapka service enhance ho jayegi. Bilkul bilkul bilkul. Aapka khud ka ek website banega ab man lo ab agar ab koi bhi jaise IndiaMART ke portal pe aata hai ab glass jar agar koi search kar raha hai ab kisi ne man lo Ajanta bottle private wale dikh rahe honge upar unhone jis pe click kara to unka ek catalog open ho gaya ab yaha pe aise kya hota hai sir aapke khud ke jab koi search karega na google pe jaise kisi ne glass jar dala ya crystal jar dala ya kuch bhi aisa dala to aapko IndiaMART ki visibility dikhta hai waha pe directly dikhti hai IndiaMART ki direct aap kuch bhi dalo google pe aap dekho IndiaMART top pe dikh raha hoga jaise directly pe click karega na koi to direct wo kaha chala jayega IndiaMART ki site pe chala jayega ab IndiaMART ki site pe waha pe sare competitor dikh rahe hain to aapki visibility automatically kaafi logon se upar dikhegi jo matlab aapke MDC basic suppliers wagera hain right to ab inse upar dikhe to simple si baat hai sir customer dekhega to obviously baat hai approach to karega ab aaj ki date mein time shortage ka dikkat to hota hi hai sir koi sochta hai ki bas ye char logon ke number dikh rahe hain inko ab aap ho aap search karne jaoge abhi aapne dekho manual screen printing ka dala ab aapne upar se char logon ko dekhe honge unhi ko contact supplier ko click kara unhi ka call aa jayega ab niche tak aap gaye nahi na aapne itna time diya nahi same aapke sath bhi wahi cheez ho raha hai sir aap dekhte honge aapki inquiry aur unki inquiry mein bahut antar hota hoga.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul bilkul wahi matter hai.
Executive: Baki aapke upar hai sir aap to dekho business kar rahe ho achha khasa ab aapko main kai baar hum suggest kar chuke hain maximizer aap lo aapke liye better hai kyunki aapke product line mein to competition jyada hai. Haan wo baat aapki baat bilkul sahi hai aap aap apni jagah thik ho hum apni jagah thik hai hume bhi thoda bahut abhi aapko dekho estimate dekhna padta hai man ke chaliye ab aisa to hai nahi hai ki 10 20 hazar ka mujhe laga abhi tak mujhe thoda bahut earn karna padega dekhte hain lekin sir ne us samay kaafi jyada matlab budget bataya tha to utna bhi filhal nahi hai na. Sir itna bhi nahi aa raha itna bhi nahi aa raha aapko agar bahut sara aap 10 20 hazar wali baat kar rahe ho dekho 10 20 hazar to nahi hai obviously lekin itna bhi nahi ki lakh rupay dena hai aapko. Sir na madam 1 lakh ke budget bata rahe the teen teen teen saal mein 1 lakh ke bata rahe the wo. To teen saal ka aur TrustSeal aur usme antar bhi to hai na sir bahut lekin haan wo wo baat unki hai dekhiye main agree hu aisi baat nahi hai lekin dekhiye abhi baat karne se koi fayda nahi hai jab mujhe lagega to definitely karaunga karana to hai ye dekhiye obviously karana hi hai kyunki uska reason hai ki upgrade rehna hai to karana padega. Sir wahi hai ki thoda sa time. Sir kai baar kya hota hai na late ho jata hai. Time dijiye. Wo baat aapki sahi hai sir wahi hai. Sir aap do mahine aap main ye keh rahi hu sir aap do mahine wali baat ki baat kar rahe hain main do mahine nahi bol rahi aap matlab do saal ke mein dekh lo. Usme profit aapka dekho do saal ke mein achha ek baat batao dono cheeze hain sir. Credit card se credit card se EMI ka option hai usme?
Executive: Haan sir credit card se EMI ban jayegi aapki aur aap aaram se apna matlab bank ke through EMI bana sakte ho aap apne direct aapki EMI ban jayegi. Credit card se ek sath payment hoga lekin aapki EMI ban jayegi direct bank ke through. Chaliye main karunga kuch din baad karunga mujhe amount bhi aapka sir dekho agar do saal ki service mein bhi karte ho na to agar main aapka waise batau aapko main dekho aaj ka main aapko ek baar ek andaza de deti hu ki kya aa raha hai price ka. Ek minute aapka jo ban raha hai wo ban raha hai 56517 GST laga ke do saal ka. Jyada amount nahi hai.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Do saal ka jo aapka ban raha hai na sir hmm wo 56000 57000 hi ban raha hai GST laga ke. Hmm jyada amount nahi aa raha. Ek minute rukiye ek minute.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Busy hain kya sir aap?
Customer: Busy nahi wo thoda pick up ke liye aaye hue the to unko OTP wagera share kar raha tha bataiye.
Executive: Achha. To sir do saal ka dekho agar aaj ka deal batau to aaj ki deal aapki jyada mahangi aa bhi nahi rahi 56500 aa rahi hai wo bhi GST laga ke. To agar man lo aap mota mota matlab GST aapka refundable hota hi hai sir thik hai agar main aapko divide by 1.8 net karke dekho to aap ye laga lo aapko 47000 plus GST baith raha hai sir do saal ka wo bhi jyada amount nahi aa raha purana sara paisa almost adjust ho raha hai aapka aap khud socho na kaha 1.5 lakh ki service sir aapko only 47000 plus GST mein mil rahi hai. Profit to hai. Hmm par wahi hai na ki ab unhone thoda bahut to adjust kara hai wahi thoda dekhte hain thoda abhi kya hai ki. Sir abhi mota mota aapne dekho aap batao apne IndiaMART ko TrustSeal ke liye kitna paisa diya tha jab aapne TrustSeal liya tha? Haan sir diya tha I think 84 ke around. 60 ke 70 ke around diya tha na? Haan GST wagera mila ke diya tha haan. GST hai na 70 70 aur aap socho sir abhi aapne 70 diya aur almost aap pura ek saal use kar chuke ho service. Haan haan haan haan. Ek saal use kar chuke ho aur ek saal use karne mein ab ye man lo ki abhi aap ye kara rahe ho agar man lo aaj kal mein aap kara bhi dete kyunki ek tarikh se sir ye sab badh raha hai to tab to adjustment bhi nahi hoga tab adjustment aapko bahut hi minor matlab bahut kam ho jayega matlab aap ye laga lo agar adjustment hoga bhi to abhi is time pe agar main adjustment aur sab kuch dekh rahi hu to aapka ek saal mein ek tarike se aapka TrustSeal ka 10000 to laga hai 61000 62000 ka adjustment ho raha hai aapka. Company profit hi de rahi hai sir aapko aur dono service usme chal rahi hai aapki maximizer bhi chalegi complimentary isme aapko TrustSeal ka certificate logo wagera sab kuch milega. Hmm ye baat to hai sir chaliye thoda time dijiye dekhta hu ek do week ka time dijiye abhi ek do inquiry chal rahi hai agar unse agar thoda performance aata hai to karta hu kuch na kuch. Ek do week mein na sir aapko 1.5 lakh rupay dena hai aaram se. Are nahi aisi baat nahi hai aap purane customer ho aapko cheeze hamesha dekho jab bhi suggest kiya hai sahi suggest kiya hai maine. Haan baat aapki thik hai par dekhiye thoda sa time dijiye please aap force mat kijiye please. Okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to add inquiry through the app.

- Inquiring about manual screen printing machine.

- Promotion not applied on all products.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to add inquiry.

- Explained about the benefits of TrustSeal.

- Explained about website services.

- Explained about maximizer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will decide after 1-2 weeks.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiry, app, trustseal, promotion, website, maximizer
